text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump As expected, none of your stuff fact checks out.  We've caught up to about EVEN with South Korea per capita, problem was that Trump ignored it way too long = why we have a million cases to their 10k cases.  Pathetic "leadership".  https://t.co/LLF0E5PwLV
